channel.title: Project16 cheezescape
channel.description: in the compile file this is wut i put: @echo off title CheezScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause and when i run it, it says this: error: cannot read: *.java 1 error exception in thread "main" java.lang.noclassdeffounderror: server press any key to continue......

item.title: Project16 cheezescape
item.dc:creator: @goku_genuis goku_genuis
item.description:
@goku_genuis wrote:

@echo on
COLOR C
title po0nscape.no-ip.org
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe” server
runserver

Read full topic

item.title: Project16 cheezescape

item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

now mine says this
Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details.
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "9
45 "
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.
java:48)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:456)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:751)
at NPCHandler.(NPCHandler.java:23)
at server.main(server.java:26)
Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

Read full topic

item.title: Project16 cheezescape
item.dc:creator: @DanOnza DanOnza
item.description:
@DanOnza wrote:

Okay… First do this…i had the same problem all i needed was a PATH aswell as a CLASSPATH

Right click MyComputer - Go to Properties - Go to Advanced - Go to Enviroment Variables

Click the top NEW

Variable Name: PATH

Variable Value: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin;C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_08\bin

Click OK

Put this in compiler

@echo off COLOR C title po0nscape.no-ip.org "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin/java.exe" server pause

Then save…now try fixed…hopefully O.o

Read full topic

item.title: Project16 cheezescape
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

i’ve done that millions of times…-.-[br][size=1]Posted at: September 27, 2006, 03:23:03 AM[/size][hr]if i make a server and don’t update, can other people still connect to my server when i’m on?
say…
i dont use my compiler, so i dont update, and when i go on 127.0.0.1, which is the default hybridscape server unless you don’t make a server, can others still connect?
and is it true that 127.0.0.1, the default server, is really my server, which for others if they try to logg into it, is gayscape.servegame.com???

Read full topic

title Yourservername [COMPILER]
